text: 1.5 Apo 26.16-18, Lom 12.3, 15.18, 1 Ko 15.10, Gal 2.7-9, Epe 3.8 Pen God ne binɨb man okok mɨdupsek, kɨli Klays nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd nop kɨdek gɨnɨgel agɨl gos nɨgak. Anɨb ak God ne Jisas Klays wog ne ak nɨŋɨd, chɨnop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gak. Pen God ne Klays nop gos nɨgɨlɨg, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb wog ak chɨnop aglak.
